title: Trump in Crisis: Grand Jury, Leaked Phone Calls & Low Poll Numbers: A Closer Look | Rep. Adam Schiff
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the grand jury special counsel has empaneled in the Russia investigation and Trump’s embarrassing leaked phone calls with the leaders of Mexico and Australia. (0:20)
Congressman Adam Schiff walks Seth through what special counsel Robert Mueller's sudden impanelment of a grand jury means for the Trump Russia investigation. (12:41)
Then, Rep. Schiff goes backstage at Studio 8G to answer a few more questions from Late Night producer Henry Melcher. (19:40)
